subjects.name: Mathematics
subjects.description: Mathematics is the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns.

subjects.name: Physics
subjects.description: Physics is the study of matter, energy, and the interactions between them.

subjects.name: Computer Science
subjects.description: Computer Science is the study of computers and computational systems.

subjects.name: Biology
subjects.description: Biology is the study of living organisms, their structure, function, growth, and evolution.

subjects.name: Chemistry
subjects.description: Chemistry is the study of matter, its properties, composition, and changes it undergoes.

subjects.name: History
subjects.description: History is the study of past events, particularly human affairs.

subjects.name: Literature
subjects.description: Literature involves the study of written works, including novels, plays, and poetry.

subjects.name: Geography
subjects.description: Geography is the study of the Earth's landscapes, environments,between people and their environments.

subjects.name: Economics
subjects.description: Economics is the study of how individuals, businesses, governments, and nations make choices about allocating resources.

subjects.name: Psychology
subjects.description: Psychology is the scientific study of behavior and mental processes.
